item.description:
Dream Factory Luncheon

May 7th

11:30am - 2:00pm

Cost: DFC member: $25.00

Guest, non-member: $35.00

DFC member + Vendor Table: $50.00


We will be featuring a Community Fair at our Medway chapter luncheon. Come see what is available in the Medway area.


There is a range of exciting things to discover, which includes colorfully crafted pottery, relaxing massages, beautiful hand-made cards, and more.

Would you like to share your gifts?

Contact Ellen Keiter from the Dream Factory Collaborative if you would like the opportunity to become a vendor. She can be reached at: ellen@ellensarts.com. Those who are interested will showcase their professional talents and connect with others!

Dream Factory Luncheon Agenda:

11:30 am - Sign-in/Community Fair/Networking

12:00 pm - Buffet Begins

12:20 pm - Welcome and Introductions

1:00 pm- Community Fair/Networking

1:45 pm- Completion/Doorprizes/Guest DFC Intro

2:00 pm - Luncheon Ends

2:00-2:30 pm: More Networking and Community Fair

You can: Introduce yourself to 20-40 other women. Learn from interesting professionals who are Living their Dreams and committed to supporting you in living yours. Make valuable connections. Experience the Dream Factory Community in action. Enjoy a delicious buffet.

To register CLICK HERE.

item.name: Dream Factory
